def_cn: (人或物的)行踪，下落，所在之处
def_en: If you refer to the whereabouts of a particular person or thing, you mean the place where that person or thing may be found.

def_cn: (用于疑问句)具体在哪里
def_en: You use whereabouts in questions when you are asking precisely where something is.

def_cn: (尤用于某些动词和形容词后，引导表示具体处所的从句)具体在哪里
def_en: You use whereabouts after certain words, especially verbs and adjectives, to introduce a clause in which you mention precisely where something is situated or happens.
